body:
Comment 2 by **tnagy1024**: 
Do you mean "do not use a build directory"?

Besides the lack of encapsulation (writing packages in the Go directory?!) which is
going to lead to disasters (compilation errors, hidden files?!!), creating binaries for
other systems/with other options/optimizations is also going to be a problem soon.

Do not overlook the toolchain, it is a very important aspect of the compiler/language.
